results.name: Sum of digits = 7 times number of digits.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: 498 is a term as the arithmetic mean of the digits is (4+9+8)/3 = 7.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 03 2001
ext: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 16 2001
